iterationHeader.copyButton.copySolution:
**Functional Purpose**: Alternative text for the copy icon button
**UI Location**: Mentoring session → Iteration view → Iteration header (Copy button icon)
**When Users See This**: When the copy button is visible
**Technical Context**: Used as `alt` attribute for an icon; must be concise
**Current English**: "Copy solution"
iterationHeader.copyButton.copied:
**Functional Purpose**: Message displayed after successfully copying content
**UI Location**: Mentoring session → Iteration view → Iteration header (Copy button message)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after a user clicks the copy button
**Technical Context**: Temporary message; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Copied"
iterationHeader.outOfDateNotice.exercise:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains why an iteration might be out of date
**UI Location**: Mentoring session → Iteration view → Iteration header (Out of Date Notice tooltip)
**When Users See This**: When hovering over the "Out of Date" notice in the iteration header
**Technical Context**: Multi-line string within a tooltip. Keep line breaks to maintain readability.
**Current English**: "This exercise has been updated since the student submitted this
        iteration. It might not pass the most recent set of tests. Exercises
        can be updated by students by clicking on the yellow bar in the main
        exercise page."
